games.title: OrbaDrone - Robot Escape
games.description:
‚ÑπÔ∏èAbout
You‚Äôre an Orb-shaped drone with the ability to repel and attract objects, awakened in a strange cave-like structure in a post-apocalypse scenario. Discover strange materials with unusual properties and use them to navigate in this dangerous and mysterious place.

üåüFeatures
‚óè 50 levels to complete
‚óè 3 types of difficulties
‚óè 4 mini-games
‚óè Customize the drone with skins that have different abilities
‚óè 2D physics mechanics
‚óè 2D light effects and environments
‚óè Control customization to choose your preference
games.howToPlayText:
Mobile: Use a joystick to navigate and 2 buttons to control your abilities.
Desktop: Use the arrow keys to move, use A to attract and S to repel

games.title: My Clearn Robot
games.description: Dive into the action with My Clean Robot, an engaging side-scrolling game where you control a brave robot fighting off nasty viruses in an apartment. Experience unique challenges and upgrades across various levels while enjoying fluid gameplay on your devices.
games.howToPlayText:
Keyboard
Move and turn - WASD
Hand attack - J
Leg attack- K
Mobile
Move and turn - move the joystick
Hand attack - hand button
Leg attack- Leg button
